name: radioactivity_concentration_of_215At_in_air
description: "Radioactivity" means the number of radioactive decays of a material per second. "Radioactivity concentration" means radioactivity per unit volume of the medium. "At" means the element "astatine" and "215At" is the isotope "astatine-215" with a half-life of 1.16e-09 days.
